title: Starbound 9月18日更新日志：SB恶行
author: zjjxs
txt_content:
18th September – Starbound Vice
mollygos posted on September 18th, 2017 in Dev Blog, Featured

Hey, everyone! In our last development blog post, we talked about tackling bounty assignments. The universe has a surplus of criminals to round up, and you can take assignments to track them down via the new Bounty Board!
嘿，大家好！在上次的开发日志中，我们讨论了如何处理赏金任务。宇宙中有一大票犯罪分子需要围捕，你可以通过新添加的赏金面板接受任务追捕他们！



The Bounty Board shows you which gang you have been assigned to tackle, as well as showing you the current targets available to you. At any given time, you’ll be assigned to investigate one criminal group and their activities in and around a particular system. Once you work your way up their ranks and take down their leadership you’ll move on to a new, more challenging set of villains in a new sector.
赏金面板会显示你需要着手处理哪个恶棍，同时也会告诉你目前有哪些目标可供追捕。在特定时间，你将被派去调查一个犯罪组织及其在特定星系周边的活动。一旦你一步一步提高他们的等级并且打倒了他们的老大，你将会在一个新的区域面对新的，更有挑战性的罪犯

As you turn in more and more bounties, your rank will increase which will grant you better bounties and more rewards. I wonder what kind of assignment is in store for top level bounty hunters?
随着你抓捕的赏金首的增多，你的声望也会增加，这会带给你更多的赏金和回报。我真想知道顶级的赏金猎人会接到什么任务？

Until next time!
下次见！


翻译：克拉诺克斯
原文：https://tieba.baidu.com/p/5330753359
